input.sentences: `` this is a coconut that i found & it was all alone . it wanted to go home . ''
`` i promised the coconut i would help it search across the land to find it 's home . ''
`` is his where your home is ? '' the coconut told me no .
`` how about here ? is this your home ? '' no again .
finally the coconut let me know we 'd found it 's home . seeing my confusion the coconut revealed that it 's a new generation of genetically modified coconuts .
output.sentences: At home the man found the coconut.
Using the coconut, he searched for the promise land.
The man told his friend he was going to go home with the coconut.
He gave the coconut a tour of his hometown.
Later on it was revealed that the coconut had modified his home.
